DOC.brief_title: Hormone Changes Women With Stage IIIB Stage IV Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Receiving Erlotinib
DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergo dermatology evaluation complete Polycystic Ovarian Syndrome ( PCOS ) research study questionnaire . Blood sample collect overnight fast . Samples analyze circulating level total bioavailable testosterone , dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate , sex hormone bind globulin . Serum luteinizing hormone , follicle stimulate hormone , fast glucose , insulin level also assess .
